subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Brophy, a hockey coach for more than 50 years, has come out of retirement this season to coach in the Southern Professional Hockey League. At age 73, competitive coals still smolder within.
snippet: John Brophy, a hockey coach for more than 50 years, has come out of retirement this season to coach in the Southern Professional Hockey League. At age 73, competitive coals still smolder within.
